comments: Radiant intensity in any given direction, expressed in W/sr (Watts per steradian), of a luminous source with the frequency 540*10^12 Hz, corresponding to 1 cd (candela). Defined and fixed in 1979 by the 16th CPGM. - _Stanislav Sykora_, Mar 30 2015
links: Bureau International des Poids et Mesures, General Conference on Weights and Measures
mathematica: d = RealDigits@ N[1/683, 120]; PadLeft[First@ d, Length@ First@ d + Abs@ Last@ d] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Mar 30 2015 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
